document.webtitle: Booking.com: Aberystwyth Park Lodge Hotel, Aberystwyth, United Kingdom - 70 Guest reviews. Book your hotel now!
document.description: Good for car parking and only a few minutes drive to the centre ... hotel is located at a busy roundabout next to an american fast-food restaurant. You will not find a park ...
